main event: An orange object resembling a comet was observed in Tuscaloosa, Alabama on December 17, 1958, traveling at supersonic speed.
interesting points: The observation was made with binoculars,The object was a single orange entity with a spec in front of it,It was reported that the object was moving to the ENE,The conclusion suggested it was probably a meteor,The sighting was categorized as a ground-visual observation.
sighted object: one orange object resembling a comet
